data.title: The label that celebrates itself
meta_keywords: Daniel Land and The Modern Painters
data.meta_description: Visit our shop Join our mailing list © 2023 Sonic Cathedral - website by Stewart Nash - art direction by Marc Jones and Stuart Jones Sonic Cathedral, Office 44, 78 Golders Green Road, London NW11 8LN, United Kingdom
data.meta_site_name: Sonic Cathedral - The Website That Celebrates Itself
data.text:
Three Quarter Skies to support Dummy

Simon Scott from Slowdive’s new band also play shows in September – click for tickets

deary support Wisp in London

The show by the San Francisco shoegaze sensation is sold out, but click for the Dice wait list

Three Quarter Skies reviewed

There are some amazing words about the debut album ‘Fade In’ in The Wire and Uncut

Pre-order our new T-shirt

It has the 20th anniversary Sonic Cathedral logo and is available until August 31

Watch the new deary video

The creepy clip for the new single ‘Selene’ was directed by Limb

deary release new single ‘Selene’

It features Simon Scott from Slowdive on drums and is out now on all digital platforms

Bandcamp bundle of Three Quarter Skies

The limited Blue Sky vinyl comes with a T-shirt and badge – click to pre-order

Rough Trade exclusive of Three Quarter Skies

It’s on Sunrise vinyl and comes with a signed riso print – click to pre-order

Watch the video for ‘Leave A Light On’

The new Three Quarter Skies clip is an abstract beauty by Innerstrings

Listen to the new Three Quarter Skies single

‘Leave A Light On’ is out now on all digital platforms

Three Quarter Skies announce debut album

Simon Scott from Slowdive’s new band release ‘Fade In’ on September 6 – click to pre-order

Tickets for our 20th anniversary are on sale

Click to see Ride, Slowdive, APTBS and many more later this year

New interview about our 20th anniversary

Click to read the chat with Cam Lindsay for his First Revival Substack

Emma Anderson teams up with Julia Holter

Click to listen to the new rearrangement of ‘Taste The Air’

Sunday Service returns to The Social

We’ll be joined by special guests for the final SC20 show – click for tickets

Ride to replay Reading ’92 set at SC20 show

They will be joined by bdrmm, Pye Corner Audio and Moon Diagrams – click for tickets

Slowdive to play SC20 show

They will be joined by deary and Whitelands – click to join Dice waiting list

A Place To Bury Strangers to play SC20 show

They will be joined by Three Quarter Skies and Mildred Maude – click for tickets

deary added to Amazing Radio A-list

‘The Moth’ has been slowly fluttering to the top – click to tune in

Watch the video for ‘Cheer’

The new Whitelands video was filmed on their tour with Slowdive

Whitelands release new single

‘Cheer’ come with a brand new remix by howdogirlssleep – click to listen

Pre-order a new SHOEGAZER T-shirt

SCR327 is printed in fluoro green on a black or white shirt – click to buy

Whitelands to play Edinburgh Psych Fest

Click for tickets to the multi-venue festival which takes place on September 1

Whitelands in new NME list

Their album has been named as one of the best debuts of 2024 – click for the top 10

Pre-order deary flexi disc

It’s a limited edition of 250 and is hand numbered and signed by the band

Watch the new deary video

Click to see the creepy clip for ‘The Moth’, which was directed by Limb

deary release new single ‘The Moth’

Click to listen to the duo’s first new material since last year‘s debut EP

Watch the video for ‘Crows’

Click to see Innerstrings’ clip for the new Three Quarter Skies single

Pre-order our latest T-shirt

The Listen To Shoe Gaze design is based on an old A&M Records advert

Buy limited Dawn Chorus and the Infallible Sea CD

There are only 100 copies of the Digipak of the trio’s new ‘Remixes’ EP available

Dawn Chorus and the Infallible Sea release ‘Remixes’ EP

Click to listen to reworkings by Mark Peters, Not Me But Us, Awakened Souls and zakè

deary announce first ever UK tour

Click for tickets to the shows, which take place in November

Emma Anderson teams up with deary

The dreampop duo have reworked the new single ‘For A Moment’ – click to listen

DJ set at Wide Awake festival

We’re spinning some tunes before Slowdive take to the stage on Saturday – click for tickets

Watch the new Moon Diagrams video

It’s “about the overlays that naturally occur in spaces throughout the world” – click to watch

Moon Diagrams shares new single

‘Fifteen Shows at One Time’ is out on all digital platforms now – click to listen and pre-order the new album

Listen to a mix by Not Me But Us

The duo have made a Monday Is OK Mix for The Ransom Note – click to hear

Whitelands play Cardiff Psych & Noise Fest

It takes place at The Moon on May 26 – click for tickets

It’s the Independent Label Market

We will have vinyl, T-shirts and more at Coal Drops Yard in London tomorrow

SC20 at The Great Escape

We are kicking off our anniversary celebrations on the Beach in Brighton – click for tickets

Listen to the Moon Diagrams single

‘Very Much My Promise to You’ is out now on all digital platforms

Not Me But Us add more live shows

Click for tickets or more information about the shows in the UK and Italy

Pre-order new SHOEGAZER shirt

This time it’s a combo of red on white / white on red – click to pre-order

Watch the new Moon Diagrams video

Click to see the clip for the new single ‘Very Much My Promise to You’

Moon Diagrams announces new album

‘Cemetery Classics’ was mixed by James Ford and is out on June 21 – click to pre-order

Whitelands on the future of shoegaze

Click to read the interview on The Culture Crypt where they discuss the genre and Black identity

Whitelands to play Pitchfork Festival

They headline The Victoria on November 9 – click for ticket info

Whitelands are Spotify’s Fresh Finds for April

Click to listen to their debut album ‘Night-bound Eyes Are Blind To The Day’

Whitelands repress in shops now

Click to buy a copy of the the Blue Day vinyl version of their debut album

Not Me But Us announce debut UK show

It’s at The Waiting Room in London on May 16 with Masal and Maps – click for tickets

Listen to or buy a copy of ‘Two’

It’s the stunning debut album by Italian duo Not Me But Us

Whitelands announce new London show

They play The Old Blue Last on Wednesday, April 10 – click for tickets

deary release live single

‘Want You’ was recorded at St Pancras Old Church in London last year – click to listen

New Soho Radio show incoming

It’s on at 8pm (GMT) on Thursday, March 21 – click to listen

Indie Label Market announced

We will be back at this year’s event which takes place on Saturday, May 11

Dawn Chorus and the Infallible Sea share video

Click to watch the clip for ‘Deus’ and pre-order the new album ‘Reveries’

Whitelands to play Brighten The Corners

They head to Ipswich for the festival in June – click for tickets

Dot Allison and Andy Bell on new podcast

They are both on the BBC World Service’s Music Life – click to listen

Whitelands to play Cro Cro Land

They’re on the bill of the Croydon festival in April – click for tickets

Whitelands’ album is out now

Click to buy a copy of ‘Night-bound Eyes Are Blind To The Day’

deary and Whitelands play in Paris

They are both on the bill for Supersonic’s Block Party – click for tickets and info

Whitelands in the new So Young magazine

Click to order a copy of issue 48 and read the full interview

Listen to Whitelands on Soho Radio

They were guests on the Get In Her Ears show – click to listen again

deary on the bill for Ceremony 4

It takes place at Bedford Esquires on June 1 – click for tickets

The classic Countdown T-shirt is back

Relive the moment in 2019 when Channel 4 went shoegaze – click to pre-order

deary share early version of ‘Fairground’

It’s a year since their instant classic debut single was released – click to listen

Listen to the new Not Me But Us Single

Click to hear ‘When We See’ – out now on all digital platforms

Listen to the new Whitelands single

‘Tell Me About It’ features Dottie from deary on vocals – click to listen

deary to support Cranes

The duo will open for the legendary band in Leeds and London in May – click for tickets

Whitelands announce three Rough Trade instores

They also have an exclusive version of the album – click for pre-order and tickets

Whitelands share video for ‘Tell Me About It’

The new single is a duet with Dottie from deary – click to watch

Whitelands announce debut album

‘Night-bound Eyes Are Blind To The Day’ is out on February 23 – click to pre-order

New T-shirts up for pre-order

It’s a return to the OG black and white design – click to grab one

Sonic Cathedral turns 20 this year and plans are afoot…

Click to sign up to our mailing list and hear about things first

Dean Wareham live album out now

It was recorded at St Pancras Old Church in London back in 2013 – click to buy

MOLLY release new ‘Piano Sessions’ EP

They have reworked three songs from their ‘Picturesque’ album – click to listen

Emma Anderson gets five stars from Shindig!

Plus, there’s a new interview in the new issue – click to order a copy

Listen to deary in session on Radio X

They played three songs and chatted to John Kennedy – click to listen again

Whitelands to support Slowdive

They open on all UK dates in February – click for tickets

Not long until our Christmas Party…

Whitelands and deary both play the collab with The Remedy – click for tickets

deary’s debut EP is in the Official Charts

Despite not being an album, ‘deary’ is riding high in several album charts

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete in Resident list

‘Datura’ is one of their albums of the year – click for full rundown

Vote for Dot Allison at the SAMA awards

She’s up for Best Acoustic at the ceremony next month – click to vote

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete in Remezcla best of 2023

‘Dínamo’ is named one of the best indie and alt-rock songs – click for list

Emma Anderson picks her Baker’s Dozen

Click to read her 13 choices alongside an interview by Jude Rogers over on The Quietus

Paul Weller loves Dot Allison’s ‘Consciousology’

He says it’s the best thing he’s heard all year in the new issue of MOJO

‘Pearlies’ is in Rough Trade’s Albums of the Year

Emma Anderson’s solo debut is at a very respectable number 50 – click for more

Third Man Xmas Fair announced

We’ll have a stall at the market at Omega in London on December 10

Mark Peters rarities on new radio show

He looks back over his 20-year career on Slack City – click to listen

Dean Wareham announces live album

It was recorded at his two Sonic Cathedral shows in December 2013 – click to pre-order

Dot Allison nominated for Scottish Alternative Music Award

‘Conciousology’ is up for Best Acoustic at the ceremony next month

Not Me But Us share video for ‘Nocturnal Emissions’

The Italian duo‘s debut single is out now on all digital platforms – click to listen or watch

Andy Bell releases Space Station live bundle

Three CDs and an A5 zine tell the story of his live journey – click to buy

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete play Levitation

They are on alongside The Brian Jonestown Massacre and others – click for tickets

Emma Anderson’s album hits the charts

‘Pearlies’ is Number Four in the Indie Albums Breakers, among others

Whitelands to play Halloween Spooktacular gig

Click for tickets to the How To Catch A Pig event on October 27

deary play five live shows next month

Click for tickets and to pre-order their debut EP out November 17

Mark Peters plays all-ages London Show

It’s for Daylight Music at St John’s in Leytonstone on October 21 – click for info

Emma Anderson releases new single

‘The Presence’ is out now on all digital platforms – click to listen

Dot Allison releases new single

‘Double Rainbow’ is out now on all digital platforms – click to listen

Get the Rough Trade exclusive deary EP

It comes with alternative artwork and a signed zine – click to order

deary announce eponymous debut EP

It will be released on November 17 – click to pre-order

Emma Anderson joins us on Soho Radio

The show is broadcast at 8pm BST on Thursday, October 5

Three Quarter Skies release debut single

It’s the new project of Slowdive drummer Simon Scott – click to hear ‘On Fire’

Emma Anderson releases new single

‘Clusters’ is out now on all digital platforms – click to listen

deary to support Slowdive in London

The Troxy is already sold out, but click for tickets to deary’s headline show

Mark Peters shares live version of ‘Sundowning’

It’s available exclusively from Bandcamp with all proceeds to Dementia UK – click to buy

The first review of Emma Anderson’s album is in

‘Pearlies’ gets 8/10 in Uncut magazine, plus there’s a small interview – click to buy

Whitelands release new single

‘The Prophet & I’ is out now on all digital platforms – click to listen

Watch the video for Andy Bell & Masal’s Neu! cover

‘Hallogallo’ was recorded live at The Social in London earlier this year

Andy Bell & Masal release Neu! cover

The version of ‘Hallogallo’ was recorded at The Social in May – buy vinyl or listen now

Who The F*** Are Three Quarter Skies?

The question on (almost) everyone’s lips is now also a T-shirt – click to pre-order

New SHOEGAZER T-shirts up for pre-order

They have a Pantone 653 blue print on navy or light blue shirts – click to order

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete announce more US dates

They join Film School and LSD And The Search For God on the road – click for tickets

Listen to Emma Anderson on Radcliffe and Maconie

Click to hear her chat and choose three of her musical favourites

Listen to Lorelle Meets The Obsolete’s new radio show

El Derrumbe is on Slack City every month and focuses on the Mexican indie scene

Introducing: Not Me But Us

The Italian duo will release music soon; they play their first show with Trentemøller on September 9

Whitelands play free London show

It’s part of the Summer By The River series – click for more info

Watch the video for ‘Ave En Reversa’

Click to see Nika Milano’s clip for the new Lorelle Meets The Obsolete single

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete share new single

‘Ave En Reversa’ is from their acclaimed album ‘Datura’ which is out now – click to listen

Introducing… Three Quarter Skies

Click to pre-order the new band’s T-shirt which comes with a free download

New SHOEGAZER T-shirts up for pre-order

They are available in maroon on black or black on maroon – click to grab one

Dot Allison’s new album is out now

‘Consciousology’ is available digitally, on CD and two vinyl variants – click to buy or listen

Emma Anderson ‘Pearlies’ bundles now available

Get the album with a tote bag from Bandcamp or signed postcard from Rough Trade – click to pre-order

Listen to Emma Anderson’s single ‘Bend The Round’

Click to hear the Lush co-founder’s first solo release out now on all digital platforms

Watch Studio Sparks’ Pye Corner Audio ‘making of’

Click to see the video about their ‘Warmth Of The Sun’ visuals

Dot Allison featured on new Uncut CD

There is also an 8/10 review and interview in the new issue of the magazine – click to buy

Dot Allison announces instore signings

She will be at the Assai shops in Edinburgh, Glasgow and Dundee – click to pre-order

MOLLY to play at Lars Rock Fest in Italy

They play on July 8 and the whole thing is free – click for details

Dot Allison shares Andy Bell remix of ‘Unchanged’

The GLOK rework is almost eight minutes of Weatherall-worthy grooves – click to listen

Listen again to our latest Soho Radio show

Click for two hours of midsummer madness – and a world exclusive first play for Mildred Maude

New Soho Radio show coming this week

It’s a midsummer special and will be broadcast at 6pm on Wednesday, June 21

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete’s new album is out now

‘Datura’ is available from all good record shops and digital platforms – click to buy or listen

Dot Allison added to the New Music Fix playlist

Click to listen to the new single ‘Unchanged’ on the BBC Radio 6 Music curated selection

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete share video for ‘Invisible’

The stunning clip was filmed by Fernando A. de la Rosa – click to watch

Mark Peters launches new radio show on Slack City

The first monthly edition of Frameworks is on tonight – click to listen

Check out the Dinked Edition of ‘Consciousology’

There are just 400 copies of this version of the Dot Allison album – click to pre-order

Dot Allison shares video for ‘Unchanged’

It’s the first single from her new album ‘Consciousology’ – click to watch

Dot Allison announces new album ‘Consciousology’

It features Andy Bell, Hannah Peel and the LCO and is out on July 28 – click to pre-order

It’s the Independent Label Market today

Come and say hello and buy exclusive Andy Bell & Masal, deary and Whitelands releases

Andy Bell & Masal album is out now

‘Tidal Love Numbers’ is out on CD, tape and digital – click to buy or listen

Whitelands announce special cassette single

It compiles their last two releases and will be available at the Independent Label Market

Free sampler with the new PROG Magazine

They are giving away the 18-track compilation in their new issue which is in stores tomorrow

deary announce limited edition cassette single

It will only be available from the Independent Label Market in London this weekend

deary are top of the pops!

Their debut ‘Fairground’ is Number One on the Official Vinyl Singles Chart

Listen again to Whitelands at The Great Escape

Click to hear ‘How It Feels’ recorded live for Steve Lamacq in Brighton last night

Andy Bell & Masal announce ‘Tidal Love Numbers’ tape

It will only be available at the Independent Label Market and at their live show next week

Watch the video for the new Andy Bell & Masal single

Click to see the ‘Murmuration Of Warm Dappled Light…’ clip by Jean de Oliveira

Andy Bell & Masal share second single

Click to listen to the edit of ‘Murmuration Of Warm Dappled Light On Her Back After Swimming’

deary’s ‘Fairground’ EP is out today

It’s available on all digital platforms and on a limited edition 10” – click to buy or listen

Whitelands to DJ at the Independent Label Market

It takes place at Coal Drops Yard in London on May 20 – click for details

Andy Bell & Masal to DJ at Independent Label Market

deary to play live set at the Independent Label Market

It takes place at Coal Drops Yard in London on May 20 – click for details

Full line-up announced for Andy Bell & Masal gig

Whitelands share new remix of ‘Setting Sun’ by A.R. Kane

It’s taken from the new ‘Remixes’ EP which is out on June 23 – click to listen and pre-order

Look at the lovely Dinked Edition of ‘Datura’

There are just 300 copies of the Espejo Rojo variant of the new Lorelle Meets The Obsolete album – click to pre-order

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete announce UK tour dates

They hit the road in September with more to be announced – click for tickets

Watch the video for Lorelle Meets The Obsolete’s ‘Dínamo’

The first single from their new album is out now – click to watch the clip by Victor Garay

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete announce sixth album

‘Datura’ will be released on June 16 – click to pre-order now on vinyl, CD or digital

The deary ‘Fairground’ EP has landed

Bandcamp pre-orders will be posted out next week – click to grab a copy before it’s too late

Uncut magazine reviews Andy Bell & Masal album

The 8/10 review is accompanied by an interview – click to buy a copy

Mark Peters makes Monday OK again

Click to listen to his amazing mix for the Ransom Note and read a new interview

Whitelands added to BBC Radio 6 Music playlist

Current single ‘Setting Sun’ is on the station’s C-list – click to listen on BBC Sounds

Mark Peters plays on the North York Moors

The show is at The Band Room tonight – click for tickets

Listen to Andy Bell & Masal’s ‘Tidal Love Conversation…’

It’s the first single from their collaborative album – click to join in

Andy Bell & Masal announce debut live show

It takes place at The Social on Sunday, May 21 – click for tickets

Whitelands are this week’s Spotlight Artist on BBC Radio 6 Music

Click to listen again to their interview on Steve Lamacq’s New Music Fix show

We have written sleevenotes for new Chapterhouse box set

It has pretty much everything they ever recorded across six CDs – pre-order now

deary play live in London tonight

If you don’t have the green ticket from the 7” make sure you get down early – click for Dice.fm

deary share video for Saint Etienne’s remix of ‘Fairground’

The clip was filmed, directed and edited by Innerstrings – click to watch

deary announce new ‘Fairground’ EP

The limited-edition green vinyl 10” includes three reworkings of the track – click to pre-order

Saint Etienne take a ride on deary’s ‘Fairground’

The incredible new remix is out on all digital platforms today – click to listen

Listen to deary on Shoegazed Saturdays

They let slip some news about a new release – click to find out more

Whitelands play their first show in France tonight

The band celebrate the release of their new single at L’International in Paris – click to buy tickets

We’ve got some new T-shirts for Bandcamp Friday

Our classic SHOEGAZER design is back, along with a new catalogue number shirt – click to pre-order

Whitelands’ new single is out today

‘Setting Sun’ tackles racism, tokenism and performative ignorance – click to listen or buy

Time Machine 01

Remembering ‘Psych For Sore Eyes’ 10 years on – click to read

Listen again to our latest Soho Radio show

It includes a deary world exclusive and lots of other good stuff – click to listen

deary announce special London headline show

It takes place at Dream Bags Jaguar Shoes on Thursday, March 9 – click for tickets

Happy birthday to Andy Bell’s ‘Flicker’!

The Ride guitarist and songwriter’s classic second solo album turns one – click to listen or buy

Andy Bell’s new CD compilation is out now

‘Strange Loops & Outer Psych’ collects remixes, acoustic versions and covers of songs that inspired ‘Flicker’ – click to buy

Mark Peters shares video for ‘Alpenglow’

It’s one of two new tracks on his forthcoming EP, ‘The Magic Hour’ – click to watch

Mark Peters announces new four-track EP

‘The Magic Hour’ is out digitally and on limited 10” vinyl on March 24 – click to pre-order

Whitelands announce new single

‘Setting Sun’ is out on all digital platforms on February 28 – click to pre-save

Whitelands announce live dates in the UK and EU

They play shows in London, The Hague and Paris over the next few weeks

Whitelands play their first gig of 2023 tonight

They headline The Victoria in London with support from Barbican Estate – click for FREE tickets

deary’s ‘Fairground’ gets a special physical release

The super limited lathe-cut 7” package is available to pre-order now – click for a copy

We’re selling off old shirts for a fiver

Grab a bargain in our Bandcamp Friday T-shirt sale – click to buy

It’s the first Bandcamp Friday of 2023

We’ll be adding new releases and offering bargains throughout the day – click to browse

MOLLY and deary play together in London tonight

Plus there will be a DJ set from yours truly at The Waiting Room – click for tickets

MOLLY release new single ‘So To Speak’

It’s out to coincide with their UK tour dates which begin in London tomorrow – click to listen

deary share video for ‘Fairground’

The clip was filmed on a freezing December afternoon by Innerstrings – click to watch

deary’s debut single is out now

‘Fairground’ is available on all digital platforms – click to buy or listen

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete add more dates

The band are supporting SUUNS in the US and Canada next month – click to buy tickets

MOLLY hit the UK Official Charts

‘Picturesque’ is riding high in the Independent Albums and Record Store charts – click to see

Further reductions in the Sonic Cathedral Shop

Just enter the code ‘january20’ to get 20% off everything – click for bargains

MOLLY’s new album ‘Picturesque’ is out now

It’s a stunning record inside and out, inspired by the art of the Romantic era – click to buy or listen

Replay Mark Peters’ Tim’s Twitter Listening Party

Mark was joined by Dot Allison to tweet along to ‘Red Sunset Dreams’ – click to replay

deary announce live shows in February

They play three dates next month with labelmates MOLLY – click to buy tickets

Pre-save the debut deary single ‘Fairground’

It’s out on all digital platforms on January 25 – click to pre-save

MOLLY’s ‘Picturesque’ is Album Of The Week on Stereogum

It’s “a chance to be overwhelmed by elegance and power and an otherworldly glow” – click to read

We are offering 10% off everything in the Sonic Cathedral Shop!

Just enter the code ‘january10’ at check-out – click for bargains galore

More information on the new MOLLY album

‘Picturesque’ is inspired by the Romantic era art that makes singer Lars Andersson “stop in awe” – click to read

MOLLY share video for new single ‘Ballerina’

The Austrian duo’s new single sounds like Sigur Rós on steroids – click to watch

MOLLY release new single ‘Ballerina’

It’s from their second album ‘Picturesque’ which is released on January 13 – click to listen

Listen to our 2022 playlist

Click to hear pretty much everything we released this year in one place

Andy Bell announces new compilation album

‘Strange Loops & Outer Psych’ is out on February 10 and rounds up his recent EPs – click to pre-order

Listen again to our latest Soho Radio show

Two hours of great music, plus our very own Secret Santa – click to listen

deary sign to Sonic Cathedral

The London-based duo are a band to fall in love with – look out for their debut release in the new year

We’re having a vinyl clearout!

Lots of titles have been reduced or restocked for the first time in a while – click for bargains

Watch the video for Whitelands’ ‘Born In Understanding’

The new single is their first since signing to Sonic Cathedral – click to watch

Andy Bell shares video for ‘Listen, The Snow Is Falling’

The Yoko Ono cover is featured on his new EP ‘Untitled Film Stills’ – click to watch Innerstrings’ video

Andy Bell releases the ‘Untitled Film Stills’ EP

The last of his three EPs features covers of Yoko Ono, The Kinks, Arthur Russell and Pentangle – click to listen or buy

MOLLY announce UK and Europe tour dates

They follow the release of the Austrian duo’s second album ‘Picturesque’ – click for tickets

The new Whitelands single is out today

‘Born In Understanding’ is available on all digital platforms – click to listen or buy

It’s our 18th birthday party tonight!

Just look at the incredible line-up – click for tickets

Anyone fancy a pint?

BREWGAZER pale ale will be available at our 18th birthday party tomorrow – click for tickets

Listen to our Floorfillers playlist

A selection of tunes that filled the Sonic Cathedral dancefloor back in the day – click to listen

Lorelle Meets The Obsolete announce US tour with SUUNS

The Mexican band will kick off 2023 with a series of West Coast dates – click for tickets

Neil Halstead ’Palindrome Hunches’ repress out now

The 10th anniversary edition of the Slowdive man’s classic 2012 solo album is pressed on ochre vinyl – click to buy

Whitelands sign to Sonic Cathedral

The London-based band’s brilliant new single ‘Born In Understanding’ is out on November 23 – click to pre-save

Andy Bell shares video for ‘She Calls The Tune’

The kooky clip for the track from Andy’s new acoustic EP was made by his daughter, Bailen Bell – click to watch

Andy Bell releases ‘The Grounding Process’ EP

It’s the second in his series of three EPs and features acoustic reworkings of songs from ‘Flicker’ – click to listen or buy

Pye Corner Audio remix EP is out now

‘Let’s Remerge!’ features three reworkings by legendary Spacemen 3 co-founder Sonic Boom – click to listen or buy

MOLLY share video for ‘The Golden Age’

It’s the first single from the Austrian duo’s second album ‘Picturesque’ which is out on January 13 – click to watch

MOLLY announce new album ‘Picturesque’

The Austrian duo’s second album will be released on January 13 – click to pre-order

Listen again to our latest Soho Radio show

Two hours of great music, including Andy Bell’s Book Club – click to listen

Mark Peters releases new single ‘Sundowning’

It features vocals by Dot Allison and comes with remixes by Richard Norris – click to watch the video

XAM Duo’s new remix EP is out now

‘XAM Duo RMX’ includes reworkings by James Holden, The Early Years and Richard Pike – click to listen or buy

Andy Bell shares video for David Holmes remix

The legendary producer and DJ’s Radical Mycology rework is on Andy’s new EP – click to watch the video by Jean De Oliveira

Andy Bell releases the ‘I Am A Strange Loop’ EP

It’s the first of three EPs collecting remixes, acoustic versions and covers of songs that inspired ‘Flicker’ – click to listen or buy

Sonic Boom remixes Pye Corner Audio

The ‘Let’s Remerge!’ remix EP is out on 10” and digital on November 4 – click to watch the video for ‘Saturation Point’

Mark Peters’ new album ‘Red Sunset Dreams’ is out now

It’s inspired by the landscapes of old Western movies and guests include Dot Allison and BJ Cole – click to buy

Dummy compilation album out now

‘Dumb EPs’ combines the LA group’s first two tape-only releases on vinyl for the first time – click to buy

Listen again to our latest Soho Radio show

Two hours of great music, plus a holiday report from Mildred Maude – click to listen

bdrmm’s ‘Port’ EP is out now on all formats

It includes remixes by Daniel Avery, Working Men’s Club, A Place To Bury Strangers and more – click to buy on vinyl, CD and digital

Mark Peters teams up with Dot Allison for new single

‘Switch On The Sky’ is taken from the forthcoming album ‘Red Sunset Dreams’ – click to watch the video

Pye Corner Audio’s new album ‘Let’s Emerge!’ out now

The “unexpected feelgood hit of the summer” features Andy Bell on guitar – click to buy on vinyl, CD and digital

Listen to our latest Soho Radio show

Two hours of great music, plus a shipping forecast from Mark Peters – click to listen

XAM Duo’s second album is out now

MOJO describe ‘XAM Duo II’ as “30 minutes of top-quality retro techno ambience and high-tech jazz” – click to buy on vinyl, CD, tape or digital

Pye Corner Audio feels the ‘Warmth Of The Sun’
